features.additionalInfo: Secured by commercial or residential properties, as well as a host of other securities that can be mixed or separated as need be.
Withdrawal of funds available to approved limit.

fees.name: Application Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Standard minimum is 0.35% of the approved borrowed amount. Fee rate varies depending on borrower's application.

fees.name: Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the Customer asks the Bank to change the security property by releasing its security over some or all of the security property and taking security over different property, without any other amendments to the agreement. It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a document.

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in relation to any bank cheque that the Customer requires the Bank to prepare.

fees.name: Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per hour or part thereof - payable whenever the Customer (or a Guarantor) requests a copy of a document (other than a statement) connected to the Facility.  It is calculated on the basis of the time that it takes the Bank’s staff to search for the document.

fees.name: Cheque Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever a payment to the Customer’s loan account is dishonoured.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever a direct debit to the Customer’s loan account is dishonoured.

fees.name: Tenanted Security Report Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per hour or part thereof - payable when the security property is to be the place of residence of the Customer and the Bank ascertains by inspection (because the Customer did not tell the Bank) that the Customer no longer occupies the security property.  It is calculated on the basis of the time that it takes the Bank’s staff or agents to inspect the security property.

fees.name: Deed Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable by the Customer whenever the Bank is required to produce a document to a government registry.  It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a document

fees.name: Additional Security Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever the Customer asks the Bank to consent to a security interest over the security property or any other property subject to the security.  It is payable whether or not the Bank consents to the security interest

fees.name: Discharge of Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the Bank agrees to discharge a security.  The Bank may use some or all of this fee to pay its external costs.  It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a release of the security

fees.name: Title Change Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the Customer asks the Bank to change the title to any security property (for example as a result of a court order or by operation of law). It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a document.

fees.name: Rollover Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable by the Customer at the end of a fixed rate period if the Customer chooses to rollover to another fixed interest rate for another fixed rate period rather than automatically converting to variable interest rate.

fees.name: Line Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Standard minimum line fee is 1% of the approved limit. Fee rate may vary.

data.name: Commercial Revolving Line of Credit
data.description: A product designed for businesses in need of a loan to expand or develop their existing business.
